name: For primeacademy
body:
Aarti C. Koralli

3889 Princeton Trail, Eagan, MN - 55123
Cell Phone # 612-345-0506

aartickoralli@gmail.com

WORK EXPERIENCE

Over 4+ years of IT experience and 3 years of extensive experience in Testing emphasis on Business Analysis, Functionality, Integration, Performance, Regression Testing for web and windows based client-server architectures. Hands-on experience in testing application with specialization in manual and automated software testing tools like HP Quality Center 10.00, Quick Test Professional 10.00, LoadRunner and Open STA. Excelled across technologies and have excellent communication and written skill. Demonstrated outstanding customer service and interpersonal skill. As a QA and TEST ARCHITECT, specializes in STARTING-UP, RESTRUCTURING, IMPROVING, LEADING, and MANAGING the Quality Assurance and software testing processes and practices, and is also an excellent team player and resource within already-established testing environments.

SUMMARY OF EXPERIENCE
  • Strong experience in Test Strategy, Test Scheduling, Test Estimation, Test Metrics, Test Knowledge Management, and Test Risk Management.
  • Strong experience in Test Life Cycle, Testing Types, Testing Phases, Test Case Design, Test Plan, Functionality Testing, Usability Testing, Reliability Testing, Performance Testing, Scalability Testing, Compatibility Testing, Web Testing.
  • Test Management Tools, Test Automation Tools, Performance Testing Tools, Configuration Management, Test Knowledge Management.
  • In depth understanding and knowledge of the software testing industry from both technical and business viewpoints.
  • Thorough knowledge of methodologies, processes used in the various kinds of testing along with knowledge of tools.
  • Strong domain knowledge of Healthcare, and Leasing.
  • Proven end - to - end capability, demonstrated by leading and executing critical testing projects successfully.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

AB Cartridge Pvt. Ltd Mumbai - Feb 2003 Sept 2007

  • Role: Seniour Quality Assurance Analyst
  • Tools: Load Runner 11.00, QC 10.00, QTP 10.00
  • Team Size: 5

    • Responsibilities

    • Design and execute test plans for vendor-based applications and internally developed software to ensure that all phases of testing adhere to a comprehensive set of testing best practices.
    • Develop use case testing scenarios and create and execute detailed test scripts from Functional Specifications to cover all functional requirements in an application being tested.
    • Manage testing issue by following an established Defect Management process and assist others to use the process.
    • Use and support automated software testing tools.
    • Facilitate or manage testing projects, including planning, scheduling and allocating resources as appropriate for the scope and goals of the project.

Project Name: AB International Leasing

Project Description

This was enhancement of AB-LEasy-online application, added couple of new features to the existing application such as free offer, order, history part in calculation parameter and policy, previously services are defined only at admin level now user can define it at policy as well as at object level, and the major part is of delear, now delear can login and create an offer, and changed the complete look and feel of the application
  • Role: Quality Assurance Analyst
  • Tools: Load Runner 11.00, QC 10.00, QTP 10.00, SharePoint.
  • Team Size: 5

    • Responsibilities

    • Design and execute test plans for vendor-based applications and internally developed software to ensure that all phases of testing adhere to a comprehensive set of testing best practices.
    • Develop use case testing scenarios and create and execute detailed test scripts from Functional Specifications to cover all functional requirements in an application being tested.
    • Manage testing issue by following an established Defect Management process and assist others to use the process.
    • Use and support automated software testing tools.
    • Facilitate or manage testing projects, including planning, scheduling and allocating resources as appropriate for the scope and goals of the project.

Project Name: AB Cartridge

  • Role: Quality Assurance Analyst
  • Tools: Test Director, LoadRunner, Manual Testing.
    • Team Size: 5

    Project Description:

    The current business was handled by two systems AB-Lease and AB-LEasy-online. Plannning to built the Unified Offering System (UOS) as an integrated system to replace the existing systems and cater to the offering needs of all the business lines and channels of AB Cartridge Pvt. Ltd.

    Responsibilities

    • Define Risk & Contingencies.
    • Define test cycles and scope of each cycle.
    • Responsible for weekly status reporting on test planning, test execution, and defect management.
    • Coordinate Release testing and understand impacts to overall testing plan.
    • Coordinate testing activities (building test scenarios, gathering test data, Deployment, results validation, defect logging, fixing defects, retesting).

Education

Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery - B.A.M.S.
